thread.title: Over 5.7 million passengers recorded by Oman AirTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Over 5.7 million passengers recorded by Oman AirTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Over 5.7 million passengers recorded by Oman AirTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Over 5.7 million passengers recorded by Oman Air Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
The number of air passengers in Muscat and Salalah International Airports till the end of July increased by 11.8% and 19.5% respectively, compared to the figures recorded during the same period of 2014.
According to the initial data, issued by the National Centre for Statistics and Information (NCSI), the people who travelled through the two airports, during the same period reached 6,246,329 travellers, 5,207,717 passengers travelled through these journeys, with an increase rate of 12%. The incoming passengers reached 2,591,542 persons, while the number of departing passengers reached 2,596,011 persons. The number of transit passengers reached 20,164 persons.
The number of travellers through Muscat International airport, including the transferred and transit travellers, increased to 5,707,270 travellers, in as much as 53,483 journeys, last July.
The number of international flights recorded through Muscat International Airport last July reached 47,230 flights, with an increase of 14.4%, compared to the figures recorded during the same period of 2014.
